comments:
Background information: A TableTreeViewer is used to hold method call stack information and the call stack is retrieved by using DeferredTreeContentManager.

This exception occurred during retrieving large call stack, e.g. call stack that includes more than 10,000 invocation entries.

There are no other information available. The console outputs only:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java(Compiled Code))

for some times, say 8 times or 6 times by different tests.

After these exceptions no more retrieving jobs can be done.

TreeViewer with TreeColumn can not be used in eclipse3.0.2. Under eclipse3.2 I have tested that case. No exceptions occurred.

Thanks
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 148403 ***
